courses.title: Elementary Hebrew I
courses.description: Students acquire reading and writing skills and the ability to communicate in basic situations. Taught in Hebrew.

courses.title: Elementary Hebrew II
courses.description: Students acquire reading and writing skills and the ability to communicate in basic situations. Continuation of HEBW 1001. Taught in Hebrew.

courses.title: Heritage Hebrew I
courses.description: For heritage students in the U.S. who have never studied Hebrew formally, but who speak some Hebrew.

courses.title: Intrmediate Hebrew I
courses.description: Development of grammatical concepts, vocabulary, and conversational abilities. Readings, audio and video material on the culture. Taught in Hebrew.

courses.title: Intrmediate Hebrew II
courses.description: Continued development of grammatical concepts, vocabulary, and conversational abilities. Readings, audio and video material on the culture. Taught in Hebew.

courses.title: Heritage Hebrew II
courses.description: The continuation of HEBW 1501 or for intermediate-level heritage students in the U.S. who can communicate some in Hebrew, but cannot read or write it for academic purposes. Taught in Hebrew.
